results.name: a(n) = the largest k such that (k+1)! divides 2n; the number of trailing zeros in the factorial base representation of even numbers.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10080
xref: Used to compute A230405 and A219650. See A007623 for factorial base representation.
Analogous sequence for binary system: A001511.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 31 2013
